TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LifetimeServices extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制 .NET 远程处理生存期服务。

span.span: Controls the.NET remoting lifetime services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分布式的垃圾回收是负责控制的服务器应用程序的生存期，并为它们的生存期结束时将其删除。Distributed garbage collection is responsible for controlling the lifetimes of server applications, and for deleting them when their lifetimes have expired. 传统上，分布式的垃圾回收使用引用计数和 ping 进行控制。Traditionally, distributed garbage collection uses reference counts and pinging for control. 这适用于有几个客户端，每个对象，但也有成千上万的客户端每个每个对象时不起作用。This works well when there are a few clients per object, but does not work well when there are thousands of clients per each object. 当客户端的数量增加时，生存期服务可采用传统分布式垃圾回收器和扩展的函数。The lifetime service can assume the function of a traditional distributed garbage collector, and scales well when the number of clients increases. 生存期服务将租约与每个远程激活的对象相关联。The lifetime service associates a lease with each remotely activated object. 租约过期时，删除的对象。When the lease expires, the object is removed. > [!NOTE] > 此类，可以链接要求。This class makes a link demand. 如果直接调用方没有基础结构权限，将引发 SecurityException。A SecurityException is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission. 请参阅[链接要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)有关详细信息。See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime/CPP/server.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime/CS/server.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime/VB/server.vb#2)]

permission.span: 用于操作的基础结构代码。

span.span: for operating with infrastructure code.

summary.span: 获取或设置每次激活租约管理器以清除到期租约之间的时间间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the time interval between each activation of the lease manager to clean up expired leases.

value.span: 租约管理器检查到期租约后休眠的默认时间。

span.span: The default amount of time the lease manager sleeps after checking for expired leases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前的属性定义的租约管理器将变为活动状态，以清除到期租约的频率。The current property defines the frequency at which the lease manager becomes active to clean up expired leases. 例如，如果设置为 100 秒租约列表检查其中是否存在清理和续订每隔 100 秒。For example, if is set to 100 seconds, the lease list is inspected for cleanups and renewals every 100 seconds. 默认值属性值为 10 秒。The default value of the property is 10 seconds.

exception.span: 在调用堆栈上部，至少有一个调用方没有配置远程处理类型和通道的权限。

span.span: At least one of the callers higher in the callstack does not have permission to configure remoting types and channels.

exception.span: 仅在设置该属性值时才会引发此异常。

span.span: This exception is thrown only when setting the property value.

permission.span: 用于配置的远程处理基础结构。

span.span: for configuration of the remoting infrastructure.

summary.span: 获取或设置每当调用到达服务器对象时延续租约的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time by which the lease is extended every time a call comes in on the server object.

value.span: 每次调用后延续当前 中的生存期租约的 。

span.span: The by which a lifetime lease in the current is extended after each call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过该扩展的生存期租约的默认值续订时间为 2 分钟。The default renewal time by which a lifetime lease is extended is 2 minutes. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ILease_ILease#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ILease_ILease/CPP/ilease_client.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ILease_ILease#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ILease_ILease/CS/ilease_client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ILease_ILease#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ILease_ILease/VB/ilease_client.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置租约管理器等待主办方返回租约续订时间的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time the lease manager waits for a sponsor to return with a lease renewal time.
The initial sponsorship time-out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主办方调用已超时的默认时间为 2 分钟。The default time until a call to a sponsor is timed out is 2 minutes. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ILease_ILease#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ILease_ILease/CPP/ilease_client.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ILease_ILease#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ILease_ILease/CS/ilease_client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ILease_ILease#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ILease_ILease/VB/ilease_client.vb#3)]
